page.title: 18LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN FARLEY
page.content: There are some adult clubs in Farley, but not every one belongs to one. The clubs are football, cricket, Women's Institute and youth club. Darts and skittles are played at the pub which has a darts team. They compete with other pub teams. The adults and children watch some television in their free time. Some of the other activities are walking, knitting, sewing, swimming, gardening and reading. We asked the children what their activities were. Some sports they play are rounders, tennis, cricket, football, pool, table tennis, snooker, swimming, hockey and netball. Some of their hobbies are collecting stamps, cars, soldiers, stickers and dolls.
